name: Just-One
description:
•  Where you will have to survive the satellite attacks, with your super ability that boost yourself by pressing the space bar.
  • "Just-One" or "Just more space" is a game where you only need the space key.
  • This game has been made for the "Novice Summer Jam Series: One-Button Input Jam".

Game instructions:

  • Press space to move in the arrow's direction.
  • Try not to touch the magic edges as they will destroy you instantly.
  • Avoid the lasers.
